docs.snippet: Yahoo stumbled through another rough patch in the third quarter, ramping up the pressure on the slumping internet company to complete its $4.8 billion sale to Verizon Communications....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yahoo stumbled through another rough patch in the third quarter, ramping up the pressure on the slumping internet company to complete its $4.8 billion sale to Verizon Communications.

headline.main: Yahoo Stumbles Again in 3Q, Raising Stakes on Verizon Deal
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Stumbles Again in 3Q, Raising Stakes on Verizon Deal

docs.snippet: IOC President Thomas Bach expressed willingness Tuesday to work with Tokyo officials to achieve a "significant reduction" in costs for the 2020 Olympics, but suggested the effort should stick to the current venue plans....
docs.lead_paragraph: IOC President Thomas Bach expressed willingness Tuesday to work with Tokyo officials to achieve a "significant reduction" in costs for the 2020 Olympics, but suggested the effort should stick to the current venue plans.

headline.main: Thomas Bach Reminds Tokyo to Stick With Current Venue Plans
headline.print_headline: Thomas Bach Reminds Tokyo to Stick With Current Venue Plans

docs.snippet: The easy road back for Gonzalo Fernandez-Castano would have been to return to the comfort of Spain....

docs.snippet: With two games under his belt as a member of the Devils, Parenteau has become the 10th N.H.L. player to play for the three New York metropolitan area teams....
docs.lead_paragraph: With two games under his belt as a member of the Devils, Parenteau has become the 10th N.H.L. player to play for the three New York metropolitan area teams.
docs.abstract: New Jersey Devils winger P A Parenteau, who was claimed off waivers from New York Islanders, becomes tenth member of unofficial 'All-Metro Club', comprising players who have played for Devils, Islanders and New York Rangers

headline.main: P.A. Parenteau Completes the Devils-Islanders-Rangers Hat Trick
headline.print_headline: On the Ice, at Least, a Forward Is a Man About Town

docs.snippet: The tournament had two aims, to break the world record for simultaneous players of the game, and to teach children strategies for saving and investing....
docs.lead_paragraph: The tournament had two aims, to break the world record for simultaneous players of the game, and to teach children strategies for saving and investing.
docs.abstract: Lagos Journal; board game Monopoly has become officially recognized sport in Nigeria, where recent government-sponsored tournament may have set world record for most simultaneous players; part of game's appeal is its reflection of country's own chaotic real estate market

headline.main: Monopoly Tournament in Nigeria Mirrors Chaos of the Real-Life Property Market
headline.print_headline: Monopoly Battle Mimics Nigeria’s Everyday Realty Rumble

byline.contributor: Chris Stein reported from Lagos, and Dionne Searcey from Dakar, Senegal.
byline.original: By CHRIS STEIN and DIONNE SEARCEY
